content: k2tog repeat from * to end of round 77 sts round 6 k round 7 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 66 sts colorwork chart round 8 k 30 round 9 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 55 sts 29 color key round 10 k 28 27 round 11 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 44 sts a 26 round 12 k 25 b round 13 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 33 sts 24 23 round 14 k c 22 round 15 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 22 sts 21 d round 16 *k2tog repeat from * to end of round 11 sts 20 19 cut yarn leaving 8 tail thread through rem sts and pull e 18 to close 17 f 16 finishing 15 g weave in ends block as desired 14 13 h 12 care instructions hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat 11 on a towel store folded do not hang 10 symbol key 9 8 knit 7 6 purl 5 4 3 2 1 10-st repeat p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2022 this pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way 08012022
